data.name: RetrieveSchema10
data.value:
SELECT schema_id [SchemaID], name [Name] FROM sys.schemas
SELECT schema_id [SchemaID], user_type_id [ID], name [Name], CASE WHEN system_type_id<>user_type_id THEN CONVERT(int, system_type_id) ELSE NULL END [BaseID], max_length [MaxLength], precision [Precision], scale [Scale], is_nullable [IsNullable], is_user_defined [IsUserDefined], is_assembly_type [IsCLR], is_table_type [IsTable] FROM sys.types T ORDER BY BaseID
SELECT obj.type [ObjectType], obj.schema_id [SchemaID], obj.name [Name], parm.parameter_id [Ordinal], parm.name [ParameterName], parm.user_type_id [TypeID], parm.max_length [MaxLength], parm.precision [Precision], parm.scale [Scale], parm.is_output [IsOutput], parm.is_readonly [IsReadonly] FROM sys.objects obj LEFT JOIN sys.parameters parm ON parm.object_id = obj.object_id WHERE obj.type IN ('FN', 'FS', 'TF', 'IF', 'FT', 'AF', 'P', 'PC', 'X') ORDER BY ObjectType, SchemaID, Name, Ordinal
SELECT obj.type [ObjectType],obj.schema_id [SchemaID], obj.name [Name], c.column_id [Ordinal], c.name [ColumnName], c.user_type_id [TypeID], c.max_length [MaxLength], c.precision [Precision], c.scale [Scale], c.is_nullable [IsNullable], t.user_type_id [TableTypeID] FROM sys.objects obj INNER JOIN sys.columns c on obj.object_id = c.object_id LEFT JOIN sys.table_types t on t.type_table_object_id = obj.object_id WHERE obj.type IN ('U', 'V', 'TT') ORDER BY ObjectType, SchemaID, Name, Ordinal
data.comment: Used to retrieve schema from a database.

data.name: RetrieveSchema9
data.value:
SELECT schema_id [SchemaID], name [Name] FROM sys.schemas
SELECT schema_id [SchemaID], user_type_id [ID], name [Name], CASE WHEN system_type_id<>user_type_id THEN CONVERT(int, system_type_id) ELSE NULL END [BaseID], max_length [MaxLength], precision [Precision], scale [Scale], is_nullable [IsNullable], is_user_defined [IsUserDefined], is_assembly_type [IsCLR], CAST(0 as bit) [IsTable] FROM sys.types T ORDER BY BaseID
SELECT obj.type [ObjectType], obj.schema_id [SchemaID], obj.name [Name], parm.parameter_id [Ordinal], parm.name [ParameterName], parm.user_type_id [TypeID], parm.max_length [MaxLength], parm.precision [Precision], parm.scale [Scale], parm.is_output [IsOutput], CAST(0 as bit) [IsReadonly] FROM sys.objects obj LEFT JOIN sys.parameters parm ON parm.object_id = obj.object_id WHERE obj.type IN ('FN', 'FS', 'TF', 'IF', 'FT', 'AF', 'P', 'PC', 'X') ORDER BY ObjectType, SchemaID, Name, Ordinal
SELECT obj.type [ObjectType],obj.schema_id [SchemaID], obj.name [Name], c.column_id [Ordinal], c.name [ColumnName], c.user_type_id [TypeID], c.max_length [MaxLength], c.precision [Precision], c.scale [Scale], c.is_nullable [IsNullable], null [TableTypeID] FROM sys.objects obj INNER JOIN sys.columns c on obj.object_id = c.object_id WHERE obj.type IN ('U', 'V') ORDER BY ObjectType, SchemaID, Name, Ordinal
